summary: Learn to enhance deep agents' functionality through customization using system prompts, tools, and subagents.

structure.title: Customize Deep Agents
structure.summary: Learn to customize deep agents using system prompts, tools, subagents, and more, enhancing their functionality and adaptability.

nodes.title: Model
nodes.summary: Describes how to customize the model used by `deepagents` with a model identifier string or LangChain model object.

nodes.path: customization > Customize Deep Agents > System prompt
nodes.title: System prompt
nodes.summary: Describes how to customize the system prompt for deep agents to fit specific use cases, illustrated with a research example.

nodes.title: Tools
nodes.summary: Describes how deep agents access a set of top-level tools, including custom and default tools, for various operations.
